thread.title: Escape to NYC - Review
thread.title_full: Escape to NYC - Review of Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Onlyforward
title: Escape to NYC - Review
text: This is a clean modern hotel at the foot of the Williamsburg Bridge. It is on the edge of one of the last neighborhoods in Manhattan that has not been gentrified. The area has that seedy chaotic vibe that New Yorkers are nostalgic for, as it reminds them of the city in the 70's. The reason we went is that the area is chock a block with live music clubs. Much fun.
